Instruction: Cut the pumpkin into wedges, removing the seeds and membranes.
In a bowl, toss the pumpkin wedges with olive oil, salt, black pepper, and rosemary until evenly coated.
Place the pumpkin wedges on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the pumpkin is tender and caramelized.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a delicious side dish.
